mapper.select: SELECT PROGRAM_NO, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, ACTIVITY_DAYS, ACTIVITY_TIME, ACTIVITY_LOCATION FROM PROGRAM WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROGRAM (PROGRAM_NO, USER_NO, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_START_DATE, PROGRAM_ACTIVITY_END_DATE, ACTIVITY_TYPE, ACTIVITY_TIME, ACTIVITY_DAYS, ACTIVITY_LOCATION, PROGRAM_CAPACITY, PROGRAM_ENROLL_END_DATE, PROGRAM_CONTENT, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_PROGRAMNO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{programName}, TO_DATE(#{programActivityStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{programActivityEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{activityType}, #{activityTime}, #{activityDays}, 'Sample Location', 10, TO_DATE(#{programEn}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{content}, 'Y');
